individual_metadata.synopsis: A fallback NGB dialog for when a non-tadpole companion tries to speak to start a dialogue that requires a tadpole.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Your head has been thoroughly searched. Since no parasite was found, it has been decided that you no longer need it.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Your mind is blissfully free of illithid infection. Your presence is therefore undesired.*

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *Without an illithid parasite buried in your brain, your words have no weight here.*
